Module grupo25_projeto
Package blackjack

Class HiLoStrategy

java.lang.Object
blackjack.BasicStrategy
blackjack.HiLoStrategy
public class HiLoStrategy
extends BasicStrategy
Class HiLoStrategy is a subclass of the class BasicStrategy that allows for the implementation of the Hi-lo strategy
